import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Popover, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { MenuIcon, XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import logo from '../assets/logo-sq.svg'; export default function Header() { return (

Close menu

Newsletters, webinars, and thoughts spanning investing, technology, and the innovation economy.

) }
